mapper.select: select * from(select row_number() over(order by product_no desc) as rnum,product_no,sub_category_code,title,price,point,kcal,volume,grade,thumbnail,image1,image2,image3, detail,upload_date,product_stock,exposure_state,category1,category2 from product order by product_no desc) where rnum between (#{curPage}-1)*9+1 and ((#{curPage}-1)*9+1)+9-1
select count(*) listCnt from review where thumbnail is not null and product_no=#{product_no}

select * from(select row_number() over(order by review_no desc) as rnum,review_no,product_no,id,title,content,review_date,hit,thumbnail,reply,reply_date from review where thumbnail is not null and product_no=#{product_no} order by review_no desc) where rnum between (#{curPage1}-1)*2+1 and ((#{curPage1}-1)*2+1)+2-1
select count(*) listCnt from review where thumbnail is null and product_no=#{product_no}

select * from(select row_number() over(order by review_no desc) as rnum,review_no,product_no,id,title,content,review_date,hit,thumbnail,reply,reply_date from review where thumbnail is null and product_no=#{product_no} order by review_no desc) where rnum between (#{curPage}-1)*2+1 and ((#{curPage}-1)*2+1)+2-1
select count(*) listCnt from product where category1=#{category1}
select count(*) listCnt from product where category2=#{category2}
